messages.content: You are an AI annotator for NLP tasks related to climate-change. You will be provided with the description of a tasks. Please follow the instructions.

    [No]: The text does not describe any specific, tangible actions being taken or performed. General statements of purpose, intention, or commitment without associated actions fall into this category.

    [Yes]: The text describes one or more specific actions being taken or performed, including processes, behaviors, or activities that are actionable and observable.
    [No]: The text does not describe any specific, tangible actions being taken or performed. General statements of purpose, intention, or commitment without associated actions fall into this category.

Formatting: Your answer should be formatted in this way to ensure consistency:
```
Explanation: [Provide a brief, clear explanation justifying the label chosen]
Label: [Insert Label]
```

Example of well-formatted answer:
```
Explanation: The text describes the specific action of implementing a recycling program.
Label: Yes
```
